post.text: "Don't boo, vote! Booing doesn't help. You need to vote." â€”President Obama on Donald J. Trump's dangerous policies

comment.author: Rebecca
comment.text: If Trump is so great why are so many major Republicans not happy (to say the least) about his leadership? He is all mouth with no knowledge, no experience in government and no interest in learning anything. A con man through and through and all of you people are his suckers.

replies.author: Lura
replies.text: If Hillary is so great- why are most of the comments on her page negative?

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Major Republicans are not happy because he is going to take away their gravy train. And don't think there isn't a Democrat gravy train running. I'm on the Trump train 2016.

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Lura A puzzle. But reading the comments I find them long on invective but short on specifics. Memorized talking points - just like Trump.
